name: HOOKIT!
description:
If you are looking for a fast and challenging game, HOOKIT! is the perfect option.
 "It's a set of minigames about catching things"

Choose one of the four minigames, and pass the time. 

Will you be able to catch everything that comes your way?

Minigames can be played by single player or two players.

It is simple to play!, you only need a mouse and a keyboard (in two player mode)

 

INFORMATION: The soundtrack is composed of songs from Freesound.com, if you want to know what they are, in the download file there is a text file referring to it.
